backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining client, workout, booking, and authentication data models with trainer/client access control and various state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two CSS theming updates for light-mode beige/black styling and aligned accent tokens.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping summarizing main frontend files and components including pages, hooks, and trainer/client UI modules.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Guide explaining how to configure and deploy custom DNS domains for the Internet Computer app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining light and dark OKLCH theme tokens for backgrounds, text, borders, and UI accents.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain declaration file listing allowed custom domains for the IC canister.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing trainer/client auth state, view routing, and session persistence.
frontend/src/components/client/Appointme: Provides UI and form logic for clients to request appointments and view confirmed ones, including validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/client/AssignedW: Fetches and displays assigned workouts for a client, with ability to start, edit, and save workout logs.
frontend/src/components/client/Compilabl: Renders a single workout card allowing clients to input actual sets, reps, and weights, validate entries, and submit a workout log.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutLo: Displays a scrollable list of completed workout logs sorted by date, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/client/WorkoutRu: Empty placeholder component for workout runner overlay functionality.
Implements a guided workout execution screen with exercise navigation and a rest timer using a countdown hook.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component displaying a styled fallback UI with reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Bodyweig: Shows bodyweight progress over time with summary statistics and a simple visual bar chart.
frontend/src/components/trainer/BookingU: Form dialog for creating, editing, and deleting bookings with validation and time calculations.
frontend/src/components/trainer/ClientWo: Displays a list of client workouts with exercises, weights, rest times, and optional edit actions.
frontend/src/components/trainer/Exercise: Shows exercise performance history grouped by exercise with search filtering and progression comparison.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerB: Monthly calendar view that loads bookings, displays daily entries, and opens a dialog for creating or editing bookings.
frontend/src/components/trainer/TrainerC: Tabbed client detail view allowing height/weight updates, viewing progress charts, and managing workouts.
frontend/src/components/trainer/WorkoutB: Form component for creating or editing workouts, handling exercises, weights, rest times, and submitting via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Reusable countdown timer hook providing start, pause, reset, and completion state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for trainer, client, progress, and workout operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Client dashboard page showing progress, workouts, logs, and supporting workout creation, editing, and running.
frontend/src/pages/ClientLoginPage.tsx: Client login form handling username/PT code authentication, error mapping, and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Trainer dashboard showing PT code, client list/details, email editing, and password update functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Trainer login page that authenticates via access code and displays service or authentication errors.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Client registration form validating username/PT code, submitting to backend, and auto-authenticating on success.
frontend/src/utils/bookingTime.ts: Utility functions for converting, formatting, and computing durations between date/time values including backend nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/trainerAuthErrors.ts: Utilities for extracting and mapping trainer authentication errors into deterministic user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingErrors.ts: Converts backend errors into user-friendly messages, extracts raw error text, and logs detailed error info.
frontend/src/utils/workoutRestTimes.ts: Normalizes, validates, formats, and converts per-set workout rest times for display and backend use.
frontend/src/utils/workoutSetWeights.ts: Handles normalization, validation, formatting, and bigint conversion of per-set workout target weights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and configuration for the beige light-theme update project.
